I love my quiet home in the suburbs, but I often go into the city for fun and excitement.
I'm looking forward to playing at a local music festival with my band.
I wear bright colors and patterns to make me feel more confident and energetic.
i just bought my first home.
i love my job.

participant_2.background:
My wife doesn't like me anymore, but at least I'm getting used to my new beard.
I take care of my appearance, but I'm not a slave to it.
I love hanging out with my girlfriend and listening to death metal.
I'm not a morning person, but I love going hiking with my friends.
My favorite thing about my job is the free cupcakes.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going pretty good, thanks! Just got home from a long hike with my friends.
Oh nice! I love hiking, but I'm not much of a morning person. How long was the hike?
It was about 10 miles, and it was pretty tough going. But it was worth it for the views!
Wow, that's impressive! I don't think I could do 10 miles.
It was definitely a challenge, but it was a lot of fun.
What did you see on the hike?
We saw some amazing views of the mountains, and we even saw a few deer.
That sounds really cool! I'm jealous.
You should come with us next time!
I might just take you up on that!
Great! We'd love to have you.
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer, and I love my job.
That's awesome! I'm a musician, and I love my job too.
Nice! What kind of music do you play?
I play guitar and sing in a band.
That's awesome! What kind of music do you play?
We play a mix of rock and pop.
That sounds really cool! I'd love to hear you play sometime.
We're actually playing at a local music festival next weekend.
Oh, that's awesome! I'll definitely be there!
Great! We'd love to see you there.
